definitions.title: subst.
definitions.body: conjunction, proximity; with sf. [[אֶחְלִי]], [[אֶחְלוֹ]] etc.; only used as a

definitions.title: prep. a.
definitions.body: (as an implicit accus.) in proximity to (as though wis.la Lag:BN 68), beside: Ge 39:10, Ge 39:15, Ge 41:3 and stood [[אֵחֶל הַפַּרוֹת]] beside the kine, 1Sa 5:2 [[אֵחֶל דָּגוֹן]] beside Dagon, 1Ki 13:24, 1Ki 13:25, 1Ki 21:1, Pr 8:30, Ez Eze 1:15, Eze 1:19, Eze 33:30, Eze 39:15; oft. in phrase (´[[י]] ´[[מ]]) [[אֵחֶל הַמִּזְבֵּחַ]] Le 1:16, Le 6:3, De 16:21, 1 K 1Ki 2:29, Am 2:8 +; of a locality (cf. II. [[אֵת]]
) De 11:30 beside the terebinths of Moreh, 1Ki 1:9, 1Ki 4:12, Je 41:17. After a vb. of motion (late) Da 8:7, Da 8:17; cf. 2Ch 28:15 b.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: with [[מִן]], [[מֵאֵחֶל]] from proximity to, from beside (cf. [[מֵאֵת]], [[מֵעִם]]): † 1Sa 20:41 (read with LXX [[מֵאֵחֶל הָאַרְגׇּב]] from beside the mound); Ez Eze 40:7 contiguous to, beside ([[מִן]] 3 c); with suff. 1Sa 17:30 [[וַיׇּסָב מֵאֶחְלוֹ]] and he turned about from beside him, 1Ki 3:20, 1Ki 20:36, Ez Eze 10:16.
